## Public Member Functions

### getNextRewritableSource() {#aae0a3466d999e3c2435e10e766335499}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;PeepholeOptimizer.cpp&#125;::InsertSubregRewriter::getNextRewritableSource (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &amp; Src, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &amp; Dst)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>

<SectionUser title="See Also">
See <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a3fa829354b3f8b782d40175469540cab">Rewriter::getNextRewritableSource()</a> Here <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a> has the following form: dst = INSERT&#95;SUBREG Src1, Src2.src2SubIdx, subIdx. Src1 has the same register class has dst, hence, there is nothing to rewrite. Src2.src2SubIdx, may not be register <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registercoalescer-cpp/#a431319a3132451944eb1d97c9514e476">coalescer</a> friendly. Therefore, the first call to this method returns: (SrcReg, SrcSubReg) = (Src2, src2SubIdx). (DstReg, DstSubReg) = (dst, subIdx).
</SectionUser>

Subsequence calls will return false.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/peepholeoptimizer-cpp/#l00287">287</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/peepholeoptimizer-cpp">PeepholeOptimizer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### RewriteCurrentSource() {#a448ffa9de937932dddc4d927c1554aab}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;PeepholeOptimizer.cpp&#125;::InsertSubregRewriter::RewriteCurrentSource (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> NewReg, unsigned NewSubReg)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Rewrite the current source with <code>NewReg</code> and <code>NewSubReg</code> if possible.

<SectionUser title="Returns">
True if the rewriting was possible, false otherwise.
</SectionUser>
